TEXT.TITLE: HARMON <HRMN> TO BUY RECYCLING FIRM FOR CASH
TEXT.BODY: Harmon Industries Inc said it signed a letter of intent to acquire for about 3.5 mln dlrs, a majority of the stock of SNP Inc, a Portland, Oregon-based company which has patents to reprocess used railroad ties into new ties for resale. Reuter
